campaign.text: A world without Free Software is a world where we are all hostages of proprietary software vendors that run our lives. To fight such a nightmare scenario we need organisations like the Free Software Foundation Europe.
campaign.author: Stefano "Zack" Zacchiroli, Former Debian Project Leader
campaign.copyright: Stefano Zacchiroli's photo by Tiago Bortoletto Vaz, used with CC BY NC SA 2.0 licence
